org.grobid.trainer.evaluation
Class PatentEvaluation

java.lang.Object
  org.grobid.trainer.evaluation.PatentEvaluation

public class PatentEvaluation
extends Object

Evaluation of the extraction and parsing of the patent and NPL citations present in the patent description.

Author:
Patrice Lopez

Method Detail

evaluate

public String evaluate(int type)
Evaluation of the patent and NPL parsers against an evaluation set in the normal training format at token and instance level.

Parameters:
type - gives the model to be evaluated: 0 is the patent citation only model, 1 is the NPL citation only model and 2 is the combined patent+NPL citation model.
Returns:
report

evaluate

public String evaluate()
Evaluation of the patent and NPL parsers against an evaluation set in the normal training format at token and instance level.

Returns:
report

evaluateGold

public void evaluateGold(File path)
Evaluation of the extraction against the gold corpus for patent reference resolution. Use in particular for a comparison with Ddoc and ACE.

Parameters:
path - file path
